AssociateFileGateway.name: AssociateFileGateway
AssociateFileGateway.description:
Grants permission to associate a File Gateway instance with an Amazon FSx for Windows
                                                File Server file system

AssociateFileSystemAliases.name: AssociateFileSystemAliases
AssociateFileSystemAliases.description:
Grants permission to associate DNS aliases with an Amazon FSx for Windows File Server
                                                file system

CancelDataRepositoryTask.name: CancelDataRepositoryTask
CancelDataRepositoryTask.description: Grants permission to cancel a data repository task

CopyBackup.name: CopyBackup
CopyBackup.description: Grants permission to copy a backup

CreateBackup.name: CreateBackup
CreateBackup.description: Grants permission to create a new backup of an Amazon FSx file system

CreateDataRepositoryTask.name: CreateDataRepositoryTask
CreateDataRepositoryTask.description:
Grants permission to create a new data respository task for an Amazon FSx for Lustre
                                                file system

CreateFileSystem.name: CreateFileSystem
CreateFileSystem.description: Grants permission to create a new, empty, Amazon FSx file system

CreateFileSystemFromBackup.name: CreateFileSystemFromBackup
CreateFileSystemFromBackup.description: Grants permission to create a new Amazon FSx file system from an existing backup

DeleteBackup.name: DeleteBackup
DeleteBackup.description:
Grants permission to delete a backup, deleting its contents. After deletion, the backup
                                                no longer exists, and its data is no longer available.

DeleteFileSystem.name: DeleteFileSystem
DeleteFileSystem.description:
Grants permission to delete a file system, deleting its contents and any existing
                                                automatic backups of the file system

DescribeAssociatedFileGateways.name: DescribeAssociatedFileGateways
DescribeAssociatedFileGateways.description:
Grants permission to describe the File Gateway instances associated with an Amazon
                                                FSx for Windows File Server file system

DescribeBackups.name: DescribeBackups
DescribeBackups.description:
Grants permission to return the descriptions of all backups owned by your AWS account
                                                in the AWS Region of the endpoint that you're calling

DescribeDataRepositoryTasks.name: DescribeDataRepositoryTasks
DescribeDataRepositoryTasks.description:
Grants permission to return the descriptions of all data repository task owned by
                                                your AWS account in the AWS Region of the endpoint that you're calling

DescribeFileSystemAliases.name: DescribeFileSystemAliases
DescribeFileSystemAliases.description:
Grants permission to return the description of all DNS aliases owned by your Amazon
                                                FSx for Windows File Server file system

DescribeFileSystems.name: DescribeFileSystems
DescribeFileSystems.description:
Grants permission to return the descriptions of all file systems owned by your AWS
                                                account in the AWS Region of the endpoint that you're calling

DisassociateFileGateway.name: DisassociateFileGateway
DisassociateFileGateway.description:
Grants permission to disassociate a File Gateway instance from an Amazon FSx for Windows
                                                File Server file system

DisassociateFileSystemAliases.name: DisassociateFileSystemAliases
DisassociateFileSystemAliases.description:
Grants permission to disassociate file system aliases with an Amazon FSx for Windows
                                                File Server file system

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list tags for an Amazon FSx resource

ManageBackupPrincipalAssociations.name: ManageBackupPrincipalAssociations
ManageBackupPrincipalAssociations.description: Grants permission to manage backup principal associations through AWS Backup

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to tag an Amazon FSx resource

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove a tag from an Amazon FSx resource

UpdateFileSystem.name: UpdateFileSystem
UpdateFileSystem.description: Grants permission to update file system configuration
